original_text: And it came to pass the day after, that he went into a city called Nain; and many of his disciples went with him, and much people.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 나인이란 성으로 가실새 제자와 많은 무리가 동행하더니

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass the day after
that he went into a city called Nain
and many of his disciples went with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자 많은 사람이 그와 함께 갔으며
